text: while we are on the topic of link field, would be lovely if you could have an option for page link with url parameter similar to the settings - navigation options
A listing page for certified integration provider developers or an option `connect for custom integration` in the existing integration listing page!!
ability to sort (and keep as default sorting) the hubdb databases by name or any other of the columns.
native ordering would be an awesome item as well.
following these lovely thoughts -- for hubDB if the rows were actually dynamically filtered during seaarch so only the rows with matching results showed. that would be lovely
